overview: Steve brings more than 25 years of marketing and sales experience to his role. Most recently, Steve was the VP of Marketing at Cassatt Corp. Previously he was VP of Product Marketing at Oracle responsible for Oracle Collaboration Suite. Steve has held VP of Marketing positions at high tech startups Ketera and Arcot. As Senior Director at Oracle, He was responsible for Oracle’s first global e-commerce marketing campaign. Steve has held marketing, sales and business development positions at Symantec, Tektronix and ParcPlace Systems. Steve has B.S. Computer Science from Southern Methodist University.
